description: Merino leggings made to move with you on every run, hiker, bike, camp-out or climb. With 4-way stretch, and the warmth and breathability of Merino, these leggings are designed for year-round use, in cooler conditions.
name: Mons Royale Merino Winter Leggings - Mens

specs.value: Merino Jersey - 50% merino wool 40% nylon 10% elastane - 310gsm
